rr.event
Class ArrayAccessEvent

java.lang.Object
  rr.event.Event
      rr.event.AccessEvent
          rr.event.ArrayAccessEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class ArrayAccessEvent
extends AccessEvent

An Event representing an array access (read or write) operation of the target program.
